name: "Divine Nose:" Kitsu-Kitsu Daruma
description: A large doll in the shape of a fox, which can never be pushed down, is based on a character from one of the popular light novels by Yae Publishing House:\nA chef with the bloodline of the noble purple fox, has a "divine sense of smell" and can accurately determine the state of ingredients according to the fragrance emitted from the pot, and then control the amount of each ingredient to complete the most precise cooking.\nThis doll is ranked sixth in sales among all light novel derivative products by Yae Publishing House and is occasionally sold at festival booths. According to customers who bought it, when they look at the doll during meals, they can recall the tantalizing food descriptions in the light novel, which whet one's appetite greatly.
